lead_paragraph: Republicans are well-positioned to win control of the House of Representatives in tomorrow's elections, and quite possibly to achieve the largest gain made by either party in a Congressional election since World War II.
snippet: Republicans are well-positioned to win control of the House of Representatives on Tuesday, and may even achieve the largest gain made by either party in a Congressional election since World War II.

headline.main: House Forecast: G.O.P. Plus 54-55 Seats; Significantly Larger or Smaller Gains Possible

abstract: Republicans are well-positioned to win control of the House of Representatives on Tuesday, and may even achieve the largest gain made by either party in a Congressional election since World War II.
